alfredsnippet.snippet:
dir_vid='{clipboard}'
starts=("00:22:59" "43:12" "1:05:07")
ends=("00:34:34" "48:32" "1:12:27")
path_video=$(basename "$dir_vid")
name_video="${path_video%.mp4}"
dir_org=$(dirname "$dir_vid")
dir_tmp="${dir_org}/${name_video}_tmp"
dir_concat="${dir_tmp}/concat.txt"
mkdir -p "$dir_tmp"

start_length=${#starts[@]}

for ((i=0; i<start_length; i++)); do
    start=${starts[$i+1]}
    end=${ends[$i+1]}
    output="${dir_tmp}/${name_video}_trim_${i}.mp4"
    ffmpeg -i "$dir_vid" -codec copy -ss "$start" -to "$end" "$output"
    echo "file '$output'" >> "$dir_concat"
done

ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i "$dir_concat" -codec copy "${dir_org}/${name_video}_trim_all.mp4"
alfredsnippet.name: Video Cut- trim HEVC 265
